original_text: And it came to pass at that time, when Eli was laid down in his place, and his eyes began to wax dim, that he could not see;
korean_text: 엘리의 눈이 점점 어두워 가서 잘 보지 못하는 그 때에 그가 자기 처소에 누웠고

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass at that time
when Eli was laid down in his place
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리가 그의 곳에 누워 있을 때

sentences.original_text: and his eyes began to wax dim
